goal.ch: 本計畫以學士班、哲研所碩班為主要開課對象，目地在訓練有能力將批判性思考融入兒童哲學教學之人才，並以遊戲化為主軸，激盪出兒童哲學的引導操作設計。
goal.en: Its goal is to train individuals capable of integrating critical thinking into the teaching of children‘s philosophy, with a focus on gamification to stimulate the design of guided operations for children‘s philosophical exploration.
